channel.title: Equipment stat screen shows unarmed char model?
channel.description:
Hello.
I am using Corby Xevolution source and it has an equipment tab screen, it works great, accept for the player model it shows is the default one you get when you first login, and he doesnt wield what i'm currently wielding.
Does anyone know how to correct this?

item.title: Equipment stat screen shows unarmed char model?
item.dc:creator: @Kieron532 Kieron532
item.description:
@Kieron532 wrote:

Perfect, ty very much!

Read full topic
item.source: Equipment stat screen shows unarmed char model?
